member.name: M:Fire_API.ref.MathConstants.GetPiFromDatabase(System.Int64,Fire_API.ref.MathConstants.PiDB,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Get π String from a specified database
Note 1 : It's highly recommended to perform this operation in a because this function performs lengthy operations (depends on your connection, server connection and computer components) so it could make your program freeze.
Note 2 : To prevent refreshing each time you need an information (it can be very long), you can set refreshfile param to False to cancel refreshing and use last file downloaded to parse information (PS : if you request fastly 2 different documents, don't forget to give a little pause to your program after first file refresh, OR you can use another instance of class too and then there is no conflict).
member.param: Number of digits to download (max depends on database used)
Do the function need to refresh the file (default = True)
Allow/disallow caching (default = True/allowed) (disabling cache will reduce memory usage of your program but you will need to refresh page each time you need information on it)

member.name: M:Fire_API.ref.MathConstants.GetEFromDatabase(System.Int64,Fire_API.ref.MathConstants.EulerDB,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary:

Note 1 : It's highly recommended to perform this operation in a because this function performs lengthy operations (depends on your connection, server connection and computer components) so it could make your program freeze.
Note 2 : To prevent refreshing each time you need an information (it can be very long), you can set refreshfile param to False to cancel refreshing and use last file downloaded to parse information (PS : if you request fastly 2 different documents, don't forget to give a little pause to your program after first file refresh, OR you can use another instance of class too and then there is no conflict).
member.param: Number of digits to download (max depends on database used)
Do the function need to refresh the file (default = True)
Allow/disallow caching (default = True/allowed) (disabling cache will reduce memory usage of your program but you will need to refresh page each time you need information on it)

member.name: T:Fire_API.ref.Fire_API_ref
member.summary:
Definitively best class ever.
Initialization : Dim fireAPI As New Fire_API_ref (useful for updates checking at startup)
© 2019 Fire-Softwares, www.fire-softwares.ga
Requirement : .NET Framework 4.5.2+
Usage : Browse documentation at https://api.fire-softwares.ga/dotnet or browse classes at https://github.com/Fire-Softwares/Fire-API-.NET
Author : Fire-Softwares
Version : 1.1
Date : 2019-12-11

member.name: M:Fire_API.ref.ExtraFile.EncryptFileWithTripleDES(System.String,Fire_API.ref.Encryption.HashingAlgorithm,Fire_API.ref.Encryption.EncryptionType,System.Text.Encoding,System.String)
member.summary:
Encrypt a file
WARNING : The encryption works with TripleDES (see class) combined with the that you choose. When encrypt a file name with this method, the "/" characters of the hash will be automatically replaced with "," because Windows doesn't accept file names with "/".
member.param: Hashing algorithm used to encrypt file
Encryption type used (file content, file name, both)

member.name: M:Fire_API.ref.ExtraFile.DecryptFileWithTripleDES(System.String,Fire_API.ref.Encryption.HashingAlgorithm,Fire_API.ref.Encryption.EncryptionType,System.Text.Encoding,System.String)
member.summary:
Decrypt a file
WARNING : The encryption works with TripleDES (see class) combined with the that you choose. When decrypt a file name with this method, the "," characters of the hash will be automatically restored with "/" because Windows doesn't accept file names with "/".
member.param: Hashing algorithm used to encrypt file
Encryption type used (file content, file name, both)

member.name: T:Fire_API.ref.API
member.summary:
Make requests to Fire-API and get response with this class.
You need to create an instance of this class with something like : Dim wrapper As new API()

member.name: M:Fire_API.ref.API.GetServerInformation(Fire_API.ref.Server.ServerName,Fire_API.ref.Server.ServerInfoType,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Returns a specified information of the specified server
Note 1 : It's highly recommended to perform this operation in a because this function performs lengthy operations (depends on your connection, server connection and computer components) so it could make your program freeze.
Note 2 : To prevent refreshing each time you need an information (it can be very long), you can set refreshfile param to False to cancel refreshing and use last file downloaded to parse information (PS : if you request fastly 2 different documents, don't forget to give a little pause to your program after first file refresh, OR you can use another instance of class too and then there is no conflict).
member.param: The server that you want information about

member.name: M:Fire_API.ref.API.GetServerStatusURL(Fire_API.ref.Server.ServerName)
member.summary: Get status URL corresponding to a server name

Advanced custom integrated RC4 class

member.name: T:Fire_API.ref.TripleDES
member.summary:
Advanced custom integrated TripleDES class
Initialization :
Dim wrapper As New Simple3Des(password, hashingalgorithm)
Encrypt text :
Dim encryptedText As String = wrapper.EncryptData(string)
Decrypt text :
Dim decryptedText As String = wrapper.DecryptData(encryptedString)

member.name: M:Fire_API.ref.TripleDES.TruncateHash(System.String,System.Int32,Fire_API.ref.Encryption.HashingAlgorithm)
member.summary: Function to truncate hash with the key/password, the length and the selected encryption algorithm.
member.param: Encryption algorithm to encrypt the text
member.returns: Truncated with corresponding hashing algorithm hash
